title: I can't figure out what font this is. Help please?
content:
I've found some fonts that are close (Futura, futuris) but not close enough. I need to match the font on a website.

Thanks for any and all help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RussiaFont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203639/http:/typophile.com/files/RussiaFont.jpg) | 47.22 KB |
author: bhoffman

comments.content:
[Diamonds](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203639/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/diamonds/) is close. the bowls on the S's seem a bit off. are you matching the font FROM a site or ONTO a site? if from a site, the link can be helpful.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203639im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sna_3895.png)
